guide: Kill Team Treasurite members in the Crystal Hollows.
They spawn in the Mithril Deposits and you will need
Heart of the Mountain 4 to go there.
You will gain progress on this by going for
the farming collection goal. Garden Milestones
will be a decent help here.
Use the best fishing rod, bait and armor that you
have access to and fish in The Park during rain.
Recommended is a Chum Rod with Angler Armor and Fish Bait.
To gain passively progress in this
you should have a pet equipped at all times.
Don't forget to use pet items that boost
their XP-gain. Things like Milestone Rewards
(Commission, Garden, Bestiary Milestones)
and Pet Candies will be a good help here.
For this you will need Combat 15.
To blow up crypts you can use
class abilities (Tank, Archer, Mage)
and/or Superboom TNTs that drop
from slaying Minibosses in dungeons
and can be bought from Walther in
The Deep Caverns or Ophelia in
The Dungeon Hub.
You will get the Rock Pet by mining 2.5k
Ore Blocks. Keep in mind that Stone doesn't
count for this. Don't forget to equip the pet ;)
Buy a Raider Axe for 130k coins
from the Melancholic Viking in The Park.
Remember: Level 1 Enchantments do count.
You will most likely get this from leveling up
skills for the Skill Average goal.
Remember to actually put the money
you get in the Bank :)
For this you will need Combat 15.
All you need to do for this is to
complete one Floor I in the Catacombs
and open the Free Chest at the end of it.
(will stay available at Croesus in the
Dungeon Hub for 48h in case you forget to
open it.) You will need a completion
of the previous floor.
For this you should utilize the Garden.
Potato will unlock at Garden Level 3.
Use the Gardening Hoe and its upgrade for this.
The recipe will unlock at Potato Collection VIII
(craft with 3 paper and 1 Enchanted Baked Potato)
Optimal tool:
Advanced Gardening Axe (25 copper)
Make a full plot of Cocoa Beans (16716 needed
or 105 enchanted) in The Garden (SkyBlock Level 5).
You will need Garden Level 8.
Get the Cocoa Beans to plant from The Desert Island.
You should either kill Endermen in
End using your Void Sword (200k) and
Ender Armor for this (buy the Ender Training
Perk from Tyzzo next to the Draconic Altar)
or Spiders in the Spiders Den with a Cleave 5
weapon. You might want to also use the free
Combat XP from Bestiary Miletones for this.

note: Find 3 pairs in the Experimentation Table
guide: Get Enchanting Level 10 and play
the first tier in the Experimentation Table
and get as many pairs as you can.

note: Gain 5 Strength from a Training Weight
guide: For this you'll want to grab a Training Weight
from a secret in dungeons and keep it in your
inventory till it shows a Strength bonus of +5.
Drop it once it reached that point.
You can buy this for a Gold Medal and
32 Jacob's Tickets from Anita. To get the
Gold Medal, you'll need 8 Bronze Medals
or 4 Silver Medals from Jacob's Farming Contests.
You will need Farming 10 to participate.
Use the Garden and its pests to your advantage.
Kill Zombies in The Hub to unlock Zombie Minions.
Buy the daily Rotten Flesh from the Adventurer in The Hub
and place them on your island. Give them the best fuel
and storage that you have access to and collect in time.
You will most likely get this passively.
Talk to Bramass Beastslayer in The Spiders Den.
Use /be ingame to view your progress once you did that.
Do your daily commissions in the Dwarven Mines
(4 per day). You will need Mining 12 to go there.
Can also be completed in the Crystal Hollows,
though it might be harder to do so.
You'll unlock this recipe passively
(250 leather collection)
if you chose to do Exterminator in Barn.
Craft it with 80 Leather.
You can also use Cow Minions for this.
Fish in the Hub until you unlock Fishing Minions.
Buy the daily Raw Fish from the Fisherman in The Hub
and craft Fishing Minions. Place them on your island,
give them the best fuel and storage you have access
to and don't forget to collect in time.
Do commissions and events in The Dwarven Mines,
claim your daily powder from the Puzzler and
from giving Fetchur the items he asks for.
Fetchurs items are all listed in the Wiki.
Try to do those while a '2x Powder' event is active.
You might want to use the Royal Reforge on your
equipment to gain more powder from events.
You can also fish up and kill Mithril Grubbers
in the Abandoned Quarry (Fishing 6).
Kill goblins or open loot chests in the Crystal Hollows,
then just throw them until you get a Golden Goblin.
Higher level eggs have higher chances of spawning,
but are also rarer to get.
For this you'll need to kill 1+ Arachne's Keepers
(/warp arachne) and place the Calling in the Altar
there. To summon it, a total of 4 Callings are needed.
Craft some easy minions while also getting
those that will help with this Bingo.
For this you will need 1 of each of the following Crystals:
Amethyst: Jungle Key and Temple Run
(the key can be obtained from Odawa as Garden Visitor,
or be bought from her in the Crystal Hollows)
Jade: Divan Mines and find all the tools
Amber: Find King, give him 1 goblin egg and find the Queen
Sapphire Crystal: 6 Robot Parts , give them to Professor Robot
(Electron Transmitter, FTX 3070, Robotron Reflector,
Superlite Motor, Control Switch, Synthetic Heart)
Topaz: Kill the Bal and get the Crystal after it dies,
you need to hit it at least once
§lFor all of this you will need HotM 4.
